.!!(SoR clip).notes: After cutscene, hold ZL and hop left to exit

_Material<1 Acorn>.notes: Save for upgrades. Do not pick up extra acorns.

Shoot Farosh (Claw).notes: Pick up parts at the end

_Material<1 Lizalfos Talon>.notes: Kill the green and/or blue lizalfos if missing a horn or talon

_Npc<Clavia>.notes: (Optional) If you didn't talk to her during inventory corruption

.!!(Slated for Upgrades).notes: If less than 3 screws, upgrade slate in Hateno 2

.!!(Save, close game, reload).notes: Clears inventory glitch and warps back up to tech lab

_Korok::N49.notes: .link([Bomb arrow visual cue]https://twitter.com/TaoPlusPlus/status/1540503079191252999?s=20&t=-pM3S_ko1Yn6rZwKS3-wHw). Windbomb over if it's raining.

_Npc::SheikaMale<Olkin>.notes: At pumpkin patch before 5pm; goes to northern campfire at 5pm; starts running around the village at 8pm

_Equipment::Bow<2 Spiked Boko Bow>.notes: If here early enough, can take while they're asleep. Otherwise, use a shock arrow.

.dir(E) + midair.notes: Wait until Riju's question, then choose "Keep up the fight!" Use minimap to find Naboris.

_Npc::Gerudo<Riju>.notes: Ikurapan gets a Daybreaker shield here as a backup to the pot lid that was broken during Thunderblight

Examine .!!(Thunder Helm).notes: Ikurapan forgets to do this and backtracks

_Tod::Noon.notes: For ice house and Beedle timing

_Npc<Beedle>.notes: Beedle leaves at 4pm. Make noon if needed.

_Tod::Noon.notes: Timing to reach Suma Sahma between 4:00pm and 5:30pm. If you're missing the window, make noon later in this segment.

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Intentionally "wasting" a fury. Look for amber, flint, and luminous stones.

.dir(<<E).notes: See map for where to drop in

Kill .enemy(Blue Lizalfos).notes: Inventory corruption leaves us missing 1 Lizalfos Horn. High chance to pick it up here.

_Korok::N30.notes: Aim with bow to get apples to spawn

.dir(N) + .dir(S).notes: .link([Dow Naeh vod]https://youtu.be/s1NM1eCjpX8?t=12108), windbomb away from the mountain and back. Otherwise, Naydra will not spawn correctly.

_Tod::Morning.notes: If between 12:00pm and 5:00am, need to make morning twice to properly advance a day so Naydra spawns.

Shoot Naydra (Horn).notes: Shoot horn first because it's less prone to being blown away

_Discover<Luto's Crossing>.notes: Discover location as you fly past

Inside divine beast.notes: .link([Vah Ruta vod]https://youtu.be/s1NM1eCjpX8?t=13845) Use gale after terminal 5 to get to boss room.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Gruve>.notes: Quest reward is 5 Fleet-Lotus Seed, will use for transmute.

_Npc::ZoraMale<Fronk>.notes: 7:00am to 8:00pm, Fronk is at the pillar. Otherwise he is .link([at the pools]https://youtu.be/3EltLt0dpks?t=2686).

_Shrine::DahHesho.notes: Ikurapan does the skip. You can fight minor tests with .rune(Stasis) and 2 ancient arrows, .link([example fight]https://youtu.be/7KzGFjpu1t4?t=13671).

.dir(<<N).notes: Bow will burn after 30s on fire or after entering some cutscenes while on fire. Cancel bow burning by pressing ZR, B.

.dir(<W).notes: Windbombs won't work on the first (and only the first) tick of burn damage. Either go fast or wait until the second tick.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) To talk to Greyson. Must have Flamebreaker Armor equipped.

.dir(S.).notes: The Rudania cutscene will likely trigger here so make sure bow is not burning.

_Korok::E06.notes: Rare ore deposit here for amber if still needed

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: Igneo taluses have the best chance to drop flint for Jewel Trade. Collect drops here and with remaining three igneo taluses until you have 11 flint.

Ride minecart.notes: .rune(Stasis) the minecart once you have a good angle

midair .dir(N>).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Morning.notes: To spawn Dinraal. If it's between 12:00am and 5:00am, make morning twice to properly advance a day.

_Material<Lynel Hoof>.notes: Save for quest. High chance of getting one, but if you don't, kill lynel near E01.

_Tod::Morning.notes: Look WEST back toward Qaza Tokki when sitting at campfire. Facing east can stop Dinraal from spawning.

_Korok::E01.notes: (Optional) Kill .enemy(Lynel) here if previous Lynel didn't drop hoof

Shoot Dinraal (Horn).notes: If you miss any parts, windbomb WEST or warp to Qaza Tokki, make morning, and return to the area to respawn Dinraal

_Snap::Quest<Kilton>.notes: It's common for the camera to not register Kilton. Take 3 snaps from different angles to be safe.

Look up .!!(East) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

.!!(Smuggle Blue Flame).notes: If it's raining/going to rain, make noon.

Activate .loc(Akkala Tech Lab).notes: Once the tech lab is activated, if it's between 9pm and 5am, Jerrin will walk to bed. Make it inside the tech lab quickly and hold the flame to the furnace (don't throw it) to ensure Jerrin is loaded in "awake."

.dir(N>) to .loc(Lomei Labyrinth).notes: See map for where to drop in

_Tod::Night.notes: For stalhorse, stalnox, and quests after Rudania

Enter Rudania.notes: Ancient arrow everything. Break ores during escort if missing amber (10) or flint (11)

_Chest<Knight's Bow>.notes: Need a single shot bow for the trickshot and a metal bow for later Eldin. Get this one if you didn't pick up one earlier.

_Boss::Talus::Igneo.notes: If need to wait for flint, can get luminous stones here too

_Discover<Lost Woods>.notes: BLSS should pass through this location

_Npc<Tasho>.notes: Move forward until you hear Oaki's dialogue to trigger the escort. Don't need to follow Oaki; he'll move along his path while we do the next steps.

Activate .loc(Keo Ruug).notes: .!!(DON'T) enter shrine or Oaki will reset

_Material<3 Bird Egg>.notes: In trees around Hestu. Save for korok and transmute.

Equip Lynel Crusher.notes: Pulling the Master Sword sets durability of equipped weapon to 40. Crusher used for Moldugas later.

Follow Oaki.notes: Follow Blue Nightshades and clearings on map

_Material<10 Restless Cricket>.notes: Spin attack grass to collect during escort. Save for quest.

_Shrine::DaagChokah.notes: Oaki finishes his walk 5h 20m in-game time from when the quest starts. Don't approach until you see the dialogue "Woo! I finally made it!"

_Equipment::Shield<Rusty Shield>.notes: Keep the shield for a korok later

.boss(Calamity).notes: .rune(Fury) + .rune(Stasis) → skew bounce + 8 head shots; or just do the fight normally

.boss(Dark Beast).notes: Can skip Bow of Light. If you did skew bounce, clear skew and ragdoll glitch here.

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) If close to blood moon, making night will cancel it while you're in castle and give you enough time to get to Mijah Rokee.

_Equipment::Weapon<Great Flameblade>.notes: High durability weapon for tree chopping, campfires

Kill .enemy(lizalfos).notes: (Optional) Take bow and pickup Lizalfos Horn if needed

_Material<1 Silent Princess>.notes: Should have 19. If not, backup at fairy fountains later.

_Discover<Second Gatehouse>.notes: For the gatehouses, there are specific places to climb down and get the location without triggering the Lynel. Watch vod in those places for how to do it.

_Korok::X21.notes: Shoot the top with normal arrows

_Korok::X22.notes: Aim at top of the wall in background

_Material<18 Acorn>.notes: Each big tree has 6 acorns. Use stasis to see them.

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Shoot midair on the way to R40

_Korok::R38.notes: You need a Baked Apple for the Apple of My Eye quest. Can get one by using Great Flameblade at any apple tree korok.

_Shrine::MijahRokee.notes: If you missed the blood moon, continue with the route. When the next Blood Moon occurs, warp to Mogg Latan and windbomb over.

_Korok::P18.notes: (Optional) Baked Apple in the hut for Apple of My Eye quest

_Material<3 Acorn>.notes: Need to pick up 8 more rng acorns during the run

_Tod::Noon.notes: For Sasa Kai timing. Can make noon later in this segment for more margin of error.

_Korok::G35.notes: Pre-aim, walk onto start block, instant square-first windbomb

_Boss::Talus::Luminous.notes: Stand on pillar with cube for G21

_Npc::Gerudo<Malena>.notes: Medicinal Molduga; 2pm to 10pm she's on the steps to throne room

_Tod::Night.notes: For Salvager chest when you get to Bridge of Hylia

_Shrine::YaNaga.notes: If raining, make night until it's not for D54

_Korok::L09.notes: Shooting Farosh will make her fly away and avoid having her updraft interfere with L30

Look .!!(Southeast) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

_Korok::L51.notes: We need a windcleaver for Weapon Connoisseur. Pick up one from any Yiga that spawns or get one during Lakna Rokee later.

Leave horse.notes: Sets up the horse for easy pickup later

_Korok::L65.notes: Do not whistle sprint until after Shoqa Tatone

_Tod::Night.notes: For the Stalnoxes coming up (if needed)

_Korok::P08.notes: Use .rune(Cryo) to move the log into position

_Korok::D14.notes: Ikurapan most likely forgot to do this korok after C77

Kill .enemy(Stalkoblin).notes: Need to get here before 5am. Backup in Kakariko later.

.fury() .!!(Enemy Camp).notes: Ancient arrow on the enemies that aren't killed by fury

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: To do a swift kill, shoot a stalnox in the eye, then windbomb away

_Korok::F28.notes: Use gale if raining; and then don't use a gale at F27

Reveal shrine.notes: Get ragdoll glitch to prevent lightning from ragdolling Link

_Npc<Sebasto>.notes: On the beach during a clear day

_Korok::F44.notes: The korok didn't trigger here even though Ikurapan shoots the apple. Backup below.

_Npc<Rozel>.notes: On the docks when it's not raining

_Korok::F31.notes: Ikurapan windbombs .dir(S) to F44 again to get the korok to trigger.

Shoot/bomb letter.notes: When you return to Finley, the letter will respawn on land

Deliver letter BLSS.notes: Fall and let Mipha's Grace/fairy protect you, don't pull glider, and the letter will survive

_Tod::Noon.notes: (Optional) You need to make it to Shamae at Mirro Shaz before 8pm and need it be after 9pm for a Stalnox

_Npc<Shamae>.notes: Make noon if needed. For Balloon Flight.

_Discover<Rauru Settlement Ruins>.notes: With superlaunch, can get this location while gilding through on the way to Helmhead Bridge

Send red orb.notes: Use Ancient Battleaxe. Just don't break it.

_Korok::R23.notes: Complete R24 before the last flower of R23

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) Stalnox coming up, make night if after midnight. Also use this in case it's raining.

Activate .!!(Pedestal).notes: Talk to Kheel for Korok Leaf if you don't have one

.dir(E).notes: .link([Two Hebra Koroks vod]https://youtu.be/d2lvD_eFjVw?t=1776). Generally the Hebra branches can be re-ordered how you want depending on time of day.

.dir(W>).notes: .link([Hia Miu vod]https://youtu.be/d2lvD_eFjVw?t=1887). Make night for Stalnox if needed.

_Korok::H07.notes: Pre-aim, walk onto start block, instant square-first windbomb

Start T06 race.notes: Combo T06 with H53, H60, and T08. If you make a mistake, you can finish T06 right after H60. Then do T08 to T07.

_ToD::Noon.notes: For Tumbo in Zora's Domain who wakes up at 7am

_Npc<Tumbo>.notes: Wakes up at 7am. In front of Mipha's statue.

_Npc<Torfeau>.notes: For these NPCs, make a counterclockwise run around the pools under the throne room

BLSS with rock.notes: Can also windbomb .dir(<W) to rock and complete the circle normally

_Tod::Noon.notes: (Optional) Little sister is not awake at night

_Korok::N54.notes: Palm fruit on nearby tree if needed

_Boss::Hinox::Blue.notes: Also clear the camp from midair to make the 1st orb easier

_Tod::Noon.notes: If it's raining, make noon back at Taloh Naeg

Return 2 cuccos.notes: Near shrine and on top of clothes shop

_Equipment::Weapon<Traveler's Sword>.notes: (Optional) Backup if you missed at Shee Vaneer

Collect fireflies.notes: If you miss some and scare the rest away, you can respawn them by warping to Taloh Naeg

_Tod::Night.notes: Because shrine quest sets time of day to 7:00pm

Kill .enemy(Yiga Blademaster).notes: 2 headshots with GEB and normal arrows will make the blademaster drop his weapon. Use ancient arrow if you already have a windcleaver.

_Boss::Hinox::Stal.notes: If you don't make it here in time, continue and make night before entering Toto Sah. Then kill the Stalnox after D56.

_Chest<Sapphire>.comment: Up in cave behind rock pile

_Npc<Calip>.notes: If it's not raining, Calip leaves at 6:00am. Sleep in bed if he's not here. Cancel dialogue.

_Npc<Symin>.notes: Talk 3 times until you get the Hearty Truffle reward. Then talk again and make sure to select "I'm good".

_Tod::Night.notes: (Optional) For Salvager chest. Make night if here after 2:30am.

Look .!!(Southeast) in the sky.notes: For Salvager chest. Watch it land.

.dir(<S).notes: Pick up/put down rock and stand on it to windbomb

.!!(Upgrade armor).notes: Suggested menuing >> Last 2 set of the wild, Zora Helm + Zora Greaves, Champion's Tunic + Zora Armor, last Set of the Wild

_Npc<Hudson>.notes: Talk to him again after the wedding

_Npc<Hagie>.notes: Western end of town past cook pot

.notes: For verification please show (1) map counter, (2) quest log, (3) master sword, upgrade armor, (4) key items tab.
